title: Sant Antonio di Padova 2002 DVDR R4 ITA NTSC
description:
Fernando di Buglione, a noble knight Portuguese, which, despite the insistence of his father for him to fight against the Muslims, decides to follow another path - changes his name to Anthony, and makes a faithful follower of St. Francis, dedicating his life to serving the Church with words and not with the sword. Humble, proud, docile: these are the many facets of Antonio. In only 36 years, in addition to missionary work, he was a passionate defender of justice, solidarity and social peace.
